markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, it’s totally impossible for a mendicant who regards any condition as self to accept views that agree with the teaching. … It’s totally possible for a mendicant who regards all things as not-self to accept views that agree with the teaching. …”

AN.6.101. Nibbānasutta (“Extinguished”)
